d1_text:
Npc1341:
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS], you've stood on the eight power spots of the earth.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½From these,[PAUSE 15] you created Magicant, the realm of your mind.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½In Magicant,[PAUSE 15] there's beauty,[PAUSE 15] kindness,[PAUSE 15] sorrow,[PAUSE 20] and hatred.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Of course, there's an evil and violent side of you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The Sea of Eden sits at the center of those feelings.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It takes you to the truth about yourself.[HALT][SET_MAP_PAL 31 6 60]
[END]
